item.title: Ban Drishti IAS: Coaching teacher’s take on Lord Rama and Sita offends people, leaves Twitter divided
item.description: Ban Drishti IAS: Coaching teacher’s take on Lord Rama and Sita offends people, leaves Twitter divided Drishti IAS is a civil services coaching centre in New Delhi that provided guidance to prepare exams conducted by UPSC.
